content: Got it, I'm ready to chat. Please go ahead.
Hi! It's great to connect with you. Thank you for being open to having this conversation. How are you feeling today?
To be honest, I feel overwhelmed. Everything feels like it's falling apart—both at home and within myself. It's hard to know where to even start.
It sounds like things feel really heavy for you right now, both in your surroundings and within yourself. That must be a lot to carry. What’s been taking up most of your headspace lately?

Honestly, it’s my son. He’s been acting out a lot, and my wife and I don’t know how to help him. It’s affecting every part of our family—my marriage, my time with my daughter, even my ability to focus at work. It feels like everything revolves around these challenges with him.

It sounds like your son's behavior is impacting so many areas of your life, and you're feeling caught between wanting to help him and trying to balance everything else. That sounds incredibly tough. How have you and your wife been navigating this together so far?

We’ve tried talking about it and figuring out ways to address his behavior, but we just keep ending up frustrated with each other. Sometimes it feels like we’re on completely different pages. It’s creating a lot of tension between us, and honestly, I’m worried about where things are headed.

It seems like these challenges are not only weighing on you, but also placing stress on your relationship. You want to help your son and connect with your wife, but it feels difficult when the two of you aren’t seeing eye to eye. How are you managing to take care of yourself amidst all of this?

To be honest, I haven’t been managing it well at all. I feel like I’m always tense, and there’s no time or energy for anything else. Even things I used to enjoy don’t seem to bring me any comfort right now.

It sounds like you're running on empty, and there’s little space left to focus on yourself in the middle of everything happening. That must feel incredibly draining. What would feeling a bit more at ease look like for you right now, even in small ways?
